prompts: Create a bird-like Pokemon with colorful feathers and a majestic crest.
Generate a Pokemon that resembles a peacock but with unusual colors.
Show me a flying-type Pokemon with a sleek body and vibrant plumage.
Imagine a Pokemon that can camouflage in urban areas with its unique patterns.
Design a Pokemon that uses its long tail for balance while soaring through the skies.
Make a Pokemon that combines elegance and fierceness in its visual appearance.
Give me a Pokemon that embodies grace and agility, perfect for aerial battles.
